page.title: 10Playground Games (2)
page.content:
We play oranges and lemons.When two children join hands the others go under and choose to be oranges or lemons when they are caught.We sing, "Here comes the candle to light you to bed. Here comes the chopper to chop off your head. Chip chop,chip chop, Last man's dead." Emma Condliffe
To play Hopscotch you have to find a stone and stand in front of the number one and roll your stone onto it.Then you jump over the one and hop and jump to the ten and back again ,picking up the stone and jumping over the number
one.When it's your turn again you throw it on the two and so on. Hannah Thompson
